actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the cikavak's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: speak with animals

1/day: silence
